T02D1444:254b-7: de dag ni sa yongs su bzung ba'o //
T02D1444:254b-8: de nas yid dang mthun par byi dor la sogs
T02D1444:254b-9: pa legs par byas pa'i sa'i char bum pa rnams
T02D1444:254b-10: lhag par gnas par bya ste /
T02D1444:254b-11: de yang gser la sogs pa las grub pa'am /
T02D1444:254b-12: sa yi rang bzhin nag po dang //
T02D1444:254b-13: rtsa ba med par mchu 'phyang ba //
T02D1444:254b-14: mgrin pa mtho ba lto che rnams //
T02D1444:254b-15: legs par bkrus shing rdo rgyus byug / gu gul la sogs pas bdugs nas //
T02D1444:254b-16: rnam rgyal bum par sna tshogs pad //
T02D1444:254b-17: lte bar bdag po'i mtshan rtags bri //
T02D1444:254b-18: dkyil 'khor pa gzhan bum pa rnams //
T02D1444:254b-19: rang rang mtshan mas mtshan par bya //
T02D1444:254b-20: 'on kyang las thams cad pa'i bum pa las kyi lha'i mtshan mas mtshon pa /
T02D1444:254b-21: mgrin pa ras zung gis dkris pa //
T02D1444:254b-22: gser dang dngul dang mu men dang mu tig dang byi ru dang /
T02D1444:254b-23: nas dang gro dang til dang /
T02D1444:254b-24: 'bras so ba dang mon sran sde'u ma dang /
T02D1444:254b-25: bri ha ti dang kanda ka ri dang /
T02D1444:254b-26: aa pa r'a dzi ta dkar po dang dando ta ba la dkar po dang /
T02D1444:254b-27: ha sa de ba rnams dang ldan pa ;
T02D1444:254b-28: chu gtsang ma srog chags med pa legs par blangs la /
T02D1444:254b-29: bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pas ran par bkang ba /
T02D1444:254b-30: shing ha sa ka ra la sogs pa 'bras bu
T02D1444:254b-31: dang bcas shing 'dab ma dang ldan pas kha brgyan
T02D1444:254b-32: pa / de dag las 'dren ba'i bum pa ni dbus su ste /
T02D1444:254b-33: gzhan go rims ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag la /
T02D1444:254b-34: de dang de'i steng du mchod yon gyi snod dri
T02D1444:254b-35: zhim po'i chu me tog dkar po dang bcas pa
T02D1444:254b-36: bzhag ste / de'i steng du me tog gi phreng ba bcings pa'i rdo rje bzhag la /
T02D1444:254b-37: de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs la /
T02D1444:254b-38: mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas /
T02D1444:254b-39: dam tshig gi 'khor lo dang gcig tu byas te mchod pa byas la /
T02D1444:254b-40: de dang de'i sngags rnams kyis brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas la /
T02D1444:254b-41: me tog dkar po dang bcas pa'i mchod yon bum bar phul bas /
T02D1444:255a-0: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po 'dod chags chen pos de'i @255a * //
T02D1444:255a-2: 'khor lo de dag de nyid du ye shes kyi chu'i rnam par gyur par blta'o //
T02D1444:255a-4: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che //
T02D1444:255a-5: rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po //
T02D1444:255a-6: rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum //
T02D1444:255a-8: rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che //
T02D1444:255a-9: rdo rje zhi ba dgyes pa che //
T02D1444:255a-10: rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog /'khor lo mkha' 'gror phyag 'chal bstod //
T02D1444:255a-11: rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab //
T02D1444:255a-12: rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med //
T02D1444:255a-13: rang bzhin dag pa gos pa med //
T02D1444:255a-15: rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che //
T02D1444:255a-16: mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1444:255a-17: 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes //
T02D1444:255a-19: don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D1444:255a-20: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa //
T02D1444:255a-21: dag pa'i ngo bo nyid las byung //
T02D1444:255a-23: ces bstod pa bya zhing dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02D1444:255a-24: de dag ni bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1444:255a-25: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i sgor rigs dang
T02D1444:255a-26: gzugs dang lang tsho dang dad pa dang thos pa
T02D1444:255a-27: dang / gtong ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa /
T02D1444:255a-28: sngags kyi tshul gyi skal pa can //
T02D1444:255a-29: nga rgyal la sogs pa'i skyon mtha' dag dang bral ba /
T02D1444:255a-30: don du gnyer ba'i slob ma rnams dang /
T02D1444:255a-31: gzhan yang yon tan med pa rnams kyang dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ba /
T02D1444:255a-32: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa /
T02D1444:255a-33: khrus byas te yon phul ba /
T02D1444:255a-34: mandala byas shing me tog thogs pa /
T02D1444:255a-35: phyag 'tshal nas pus mo'i lha nga sa la gtsugs pa thal mo sbyar te gsol ba btab pa /
T02D1444:255a-36: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la brten pa rnams la /
T02D1444:255a-37: chos bshad pas spro ba bskyed par bya ste /
T02D1444:255a-38: rang gis bslabs dang ldan pa'i 'khor //
T02D1444:255a-39: bzhi la rjes su gnang ba dang //
T02D1444:255a-40: theg chen blo la yang dag pa'i //
T02D1444:255a-41: cho ga de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs //
T02D1444:255a-42: gsang sngags dngos grub don gnyer gang //
T02D1444:255a-43: bsod nams 'dod pa de bzhin gzhan //
T02D1444:255a-44: 'jig rten pha rol la gzhol ba //
T02D1444:255b-1: blo bzang dad pa cher byas 'jug /'jig rten 'di pa'i 'bras spangs nas //
T02D1444:255b-2: 'jig rten gzhan don la dmigs na //
T02D1444:255b-5: de phyir 'jig rten gzhan dag gi //
T02D1444:255b-6: dngos grub don du yid brtan gyis //
T02D1444:255b-8: de rnams kyang blos rang gi lus la bcug ste /
T02D1444:255b-9: rdo rje dang padma dag par byas nas /
T02D1444:255b-10: he ru ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis par dmigs te gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1444:255b-11: rnal 'byor ma dang zhal sbyor bzhugs //
T02D1444:255b-12: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa'i rgyal byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
T02D1444:255b-13: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D1444:255b-14: dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol //
T02D1444:255b-15: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D1444:255b-16: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D1444:255b-17: skyabs gsum po ni bdag la stsol //
T02D1444:255b-18: thar chen mchog gi pho brang du //
T02D1444:255b-19: mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol //
T02D1444:255b-20: zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod nas /
T02D1444:255b-21: gus pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnams las gcig gtso bor byas la /
T02D1444:255b-22: bu tshur theg pa chen po yi //
T02D1444:255b-23: tshul chen snod ni khyod yin pas //
T02D1444:255b-24: gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni //
T02D1444:255b-25: khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02D1444:255b-26: sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje can //
T02D1444:255b-27: sangs rgyas dus gsum 'byung ba rnams //
T02D1444:255b-28: rdo rje gsang sngags rab bsgoms pas //
T02D1444:255b-29: ye shes mnyam med yang dag brnyes //
T02D1444:255b-30: sh'akya seng ge sogs mchog gis //
T02D1444:255b-31: gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med pas //
T02D1444:255b-32: drag po chen po bdud kyi sde //
T02D1444:255b-33: stobs chen yang dag de yis bcom //
T02D1444:255b-36: de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02D1444:255b-37: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / ces brjod de bstan par bya'o //
T02D1444:255b-39: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi //
T02D1444:255b-40: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02D1444:255b-41: 'gro ba'i bsod nams rjes yi rang //
T02D1444:255b-42: sangs rgyas byang chub yid la bzhag / ces brjod
T02D1444:255b-43: pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams dran par
T02D1444:255b-44: bya'o / de dag ni dbang bskur ba la sogs
T02D1444:255b-45: pa lnga 'dod pa'i slob ma'i thun mong gi sdom
T02D1444:256a-0: bya'o / pa'o // de nas slob dpon gyi @256a * //
T02D1444:256a-1: sdom pa 'dzin par 'dod pa'i slob mas slob dpon
T02D1444:256a-2: gyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas thal mo khong
T02D1444:256a-4: 'khor lo mi ldog dbang bskur mchog / stsal nas mgon po bdag la ni //
T02D1444:256a-5: 'khor lo lha yi de nyid dang //
T02D1444:256a-6: slob dpon gyi ni las rnams dang//
T02D1444:256a-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig gi //
T02D1444:256a-8: sdom pa gsang ba bla med pa //
T02D1444:256a-9: rtag tu sems can kun don phyir //
T02D1444:256a-10: slob dpon khyod kyis bdag la gsungs //
T02D1444:256a-11: zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1444:256a-12: de nas gsol ba btab pa'i bla mas rigs thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D1444:256a-13: che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di //
T02D1444:256a-14: byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin cing //
T02D1444:256a-15: dam tshig sdom dang gsang ba yi //
T02D1444:256a-18: de nas slob dpon gyis brjod par bya ba ni /
T02D1444:256a-19: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1444:256a-20: gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa'i //
T02D1444:256a-21: gsang ba yongs su 'dzin pa ni //
T02D1444:256a-22: bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam //
T02D1444:256a-23: des kyang bdag ni rab tu 'tshal //
T02D1444:256a-25: de nas bla mas brjod par bya ba ni /
T02D1444:256a-26: sangs rgyas rdo rje rin po che //
T02D1444:256a-27: padma las kyi rigs mchog gi //
T02D1444:256a-28: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni ;
T02D1444:256a-29: / yang dag nyid du so sor gzung //
T02D1444:256a-30: rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi yang //
T02D1444:256a-31: phas pham bzhi dang mi dge bcu //
T02D1444:256a-32: rnam par 'khrul par chang btung ba //
T02D1444:256a-33: de dag kun du spang bar gyis //
T02D1444:256a-34: sems can don min bya min spongs //
T02D1444:256a-35: dam pa nyer bsten rnal 'byor kun //
T02D1444:256a-36: theg pa dman la 'dod ma byed //
T02D1444:256a-37: sems can don la rgyab phyogs min //
T02D1444:256a-39: lha sogs brnyas min rgya mi 'gong //
T02D1444:256a-40: 'di dag dam tshig ces su bstan //
T02D1444:256a-41: sdom brtson khyod kyis bsrung bar gyis //
T02D1444:256a-42: de nas slob mas brjod par bya ba ni /
T02D1444:256a-43: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus pa'i sku //
T02D1444:256a-44: slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la gson //
T02D1444:256a-45: khyab bdag ji ltar bka' stsal pa //
T02D1444:256a-46: de ltar bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal //
T02D1444:256a-47: de nas bla ma'i ngag gis 'di //
T02D1444:256a-48: sdom pa legs par blang bar bya //
T02D1444:256a-49: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02D1444:256a-50: rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges mdzad pa'i //
T02D1444:256b-0: @256b byang chub sems ni bla na med //
T02D1444:256b-1: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D1444:256b-2: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la //
T02D1444:256b-3: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
T02D1444:256b-4: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02D1444:256b-5: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02D1444:256b-6: bdag gis brtan par gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1444:256b-7: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D1444:256b-8: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02D1444:256b-9: deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1444:256b-10: nam du yang ni mi spong ngo //
T02D1444:256b-11: rdo rje'i rigs mchog chen po la //
T02D1444:256b-12: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang //
T02D1444:256b-13: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1444:256b-14: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1444:256b-15: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D1444:256b-16: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02D1444:256b-17: zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams //
T02D1444:256b-18: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02D1444:256b-19: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02D1444:256b-20: padma'i rigs chen dag pa la //
T02D1444:256b-21: phyi dang gsang ba theg pa yi //
T02D1444:256b-22: dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1444:256b-23: las kyi rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D1444:256b-24: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02D1444:256b-25: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1444:256b-26: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02D1444:256b-27: bcu bzhi yi ni rab dbye bas //
T02D1444:256b-28: rtsa ba'i ltung ba spang bar bgyi //
T02D1444:256b-29: gzhan yang yan lag ltung ba rnams //
T02D1444:256b-30: bdag gis rab tu spang bar bgyi //
T02D1444:256b-31: srog chags gsad par mi bya zhing //
T02D1444:256b-32: ma byin bar yang mi blang ngo //
T02D1444:256b-33: 'dod la log par mi spyad kyang //
T02D1444:256b-34: brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o //
T02D1444:256b-35: lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang //
T02D1444:256b-36: ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dang ni //
T02D1444:256b-37: yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag gi //
T02D1444:256b-38: dge ba dag ni bskyang bar bgyi //
T02D1444:256b-39: don min kun gyi rtsab yi //
T02D1444:256b-41: sems can gdul don ma gtogs par //
T02D1444:256b-42: bya min thams cad spang bar bgyi //
T02D1444:256b-43: skyes bu dam pa bsten bgyi zhing //
T02D1444:256b-44: rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bgyi //
T02D1444:256b-45: theg pa dman la 'dod pa yang //
T02D1444:256b-46: 'bad pa yis ni spang bar bgyi //
T02D1444:256b-47: ma bsgral ba rnams bdag gis bsgral //
T02D1444:256b-48: ma grol pa rnams grol bar bgyi //
T02D1444:256b-49: dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02D1444:256b-50: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02D1444:256b-51: 'khor ba spang bar mi bgyi zhing //
T02D1444:256b-52: mya ngan 'das la chags mi bgyi //
T02D1444:256b-53: lha dang lha min gsang ba pa //
T02D1444:256b-54: gtso bo bdag gis brnyas mi bgyi //
T02D1444:257a-3: dus 'di nas ni gzung nas ni //
T02D1444:257a-4: byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar //
T02D1444:257a-5: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D1444:257a-6: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02D1444:257a-7: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D1444:257a-8: sdom pa dag kyang ma lus gzung //
T02D1444:257a-9: de dag ni slob dpon gyi sdom pa gzung ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1444:257a-10: de nas zhal bzhi'i sngags kyis de dag la shin tu bsrungs la /
T02D1444:257a-11: de rnams kyi snying gar yi ge h'um las rdo rje /
T02D1444:257a-12: mgrin par yi ge a'a: las padma /

T02D1444:257a-14: mtshan ma de rnams kyi lte ba'i dbus su sa bon de rnams bsam par bya'o //

T02D1444:257a-16: snying ga dang mgrin pa dang mgo bor byug par bya'o //
T02D1444:257a-17: de nas de dag gi spyi bor me tog / mdun du spos dang mar me /
T02D1444:257a-19: lag par zas mchog sbyin par bya ste /
T02D1444:257a-20: thams cad la las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas la sbyin no //
T02D1444:257a-21: de nas rdo rje phag mo'i snying po'i sngags kyis
T02D1444:257a-22: mngon par bsngags pa'i aa shvadtha la sogs pa'i so
T02D1444:257a-23: shing mi 'khyog pa srin bu med pa ma gas
T02D1444:257a-25: sor bcu gnyis mthe'u chung gi tshad tsam rtse mo
T02D1444:257a-26: me tog mdzes pa can dri zhim po'i chus bkrus
T02D1444:257a-27: pa slob ma rnams kha byang du bltas pa'i thal
T02D1444:257a-28: mor sbyin no // de rnams shar phyogs su kha bltas nas gnas pa la 'char bcug la /
T02D1444:257a-29: zur bzhi pa la gru gang tsam du ba lang
T02D1444:257a-30: gi lci bas byugs pa'i sa la ltos pa med
T02D1444:257a-32: de nas so shing ltung ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas
T02D1444:257a-33: de rnams kyi zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub
T02D1444:257a-35: shar dang lho dang nub dang byang du kha bltas nas lhung na /
T02D1444:257a-36: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhi ba dang drag shul spyod pa dang dbang dang /
T02D1444:257a-38: mtshams rnams su bltas na 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub 'thob po //
T02D1444:257a-39: steng du kha bltas te lhung na rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'thob bo //
T02D1444:257a-40: 'og tu kha bltas te lhung nas 'og gi dngos grub 'thob bo //
T02D1444:257a-41: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du lhung na dngos grub med pa yin no //
T02D1444:257a-42: de nas yi ge h'um las byung ba'i de nyid gsum bzlas pa'i chu 'thor 'thung bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1444:257b-0: aom hr'i: bi shuddha sarbba dharma @257b sarbba p'a pam
T02D1444:257b-1: ni ts'a sya bi sho dha ya sarbba bi kalp'am
T02D1444:257b-2: aa pa na ya h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod
T02D1444:257b-3: cing skyor ba gsum 'thung du gzhug go //
T02D1444:257b-4: de nas tshad legs ba'i skud pa sum sgril mdud pa gsum dang ldan pa /
T02D1444:257b-5: rang gi lha'i sngags bzlas pa byas pa bdag nyid
T02D1444:257b-6: kyis de rnams kyi dbung pa g-yas pa la bcings
T02D1444:257b-7: pas kun nas bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D1444:257b-8: yi ge h'um las skyes pa'i ku sha gsar ba
T02D1444:257b-9: ma nyams pa las las kyi lha mo'i sngags bzlas
T02D1444:257b-10: pa stan dang sngas su sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1444:257b-11: de nas chos bstan pas spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir /
T02D1444:257b-12: thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'jig rten du /
T02D1444:257b-13: au dumb'a ra'i me tog bzhin //
T02D1444:257b-16: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba //
T02D1444:257b-17: de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste //
T02D1444:257b-18: gang gis mnyam med sems can don //
T02D1444:257b-19: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
T02D1444:257b-20: bskal pa bye ba du mar ni //
T02D1444:257b-21: sngon chad sdig pa bya ba gang //
T02D1444:257b-22: dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra mthong ma thag / de dag thams cad zad 'gyur na //

T02D1444:260b-25: de dag ni dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'o //
T02D1444:260b-26: de nas slob dpon bdag nyid slob ma 'jug pa'i chogs dkyil 'khor du zhugs te /
T02D1444:260b-27: dbang bskur ba thams cad rdzogs par bya ba dang /
T02D1444:260b-28: rjes su gnang ba la sogs pa thob par bya ba dang /
T02D1444:260b-29: 'dod chags chen po las byung ba'i de kho na nyid bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin dang /
T02D1444:260b-30: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yang gzugs brnyan ltar chos
T02D1444:260b-31: nyid kyis shes par byas nas tshigs su bcad pa
T02D1444:260b-32: gdon te / nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir //
T02D1444:260b-33: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog / sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
T02D1444:260b-34: bde mchog 'khor lor bdag grub mdzod //
T02D1444:261a-2: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
T02D1444:261a-3: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02D1444:261a-4: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod //
T02D1444:261a-5: nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa ste //
T02D1444:261a-6: 'dod chags kun gyis rjes chags pa //
T02D1444:261a-7: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
T02D1444:261a-8: bcom ldan de nyid bdag grub mdzod //
T02D1444:261a-9: shin tu dag pa sku yi mchog / gzod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1444:261a-10: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D1444:261a-11: byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod //
T02D1444:261a-12: kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
T02D1444:261a-13: dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya mchog / grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pa //
T02D1444:261a-14: rdo rje snyems bdag bdag grub mdzod ;
T02D1444:261a-15: / sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa //
T02D1444:261a-16: sems can kun gyi yid la gnas //
T02D1444:261a-17: sems can kun gyi yab nyid de //
T02D1444:261a-18: 'dod chags mchog gi dam tshig mchog / ces so //
T02D1444:261a-19: da ni tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis bden pa'i byin brlab bya ste /
T02D1444:261a-20: shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02D1444:261a-21: bden pa gang gi ye shes mchog / bden pa de yis mgon khyod kyis //
T02D1444:261a-22: bdag gi 'dod pa yongs rdzogs mdzod //
T02D1444:261a-23: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D1444:261a-24: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02D1444:261a-25: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02D1444:261a-26: rgyu dang las las kun du 'byung //
T02D1444:261a-27: de bzhin de kho nyid las byung ;
T02D1444:261a-29: gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma ni //
T02D1444:261a-30: kun gyi dri med mthong bar shog / ces so //
T02D1444:261a-31: de nas yol ba'i phyi rol du khrus byas shing
T02D1444:261a-32: dri zhim po la sogs pas gtsang bar gyur pa
T02D1444:261a-33: / dbang bskur ba'i snod du rung ba'i slob mas yon phul te /
T02D1444:261a-34: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku //
T02D1444:261a-35: rdo rje 'chang chen ngo bo nyid //
T02D1444:261a-36: dmigs med bde chen ston pa po //
T02D1444:261a-37: slob dpon chen po la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1444:261a-39: don dam rnal 'byor smra ba'i seng ge ces bya ba //
T02D1444:261a-40: nyon mongs gcod pa'i don la shin tu mkhas gyur pa //
T02D1444:261a-41: srid pa'i nyes brgya bskyed pa'i nyon mongs bcom mdzad pa //
T02D1444:261a-42: rnal 'byor don dam rgyal po de nyid grub par mdzod //
T02D1444:261a-43: ces sogs gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D1444:261a-44: de dpal bde mchog zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i gzugs su bltas la /
T02D1444:261b-0: aa kham b'i ra h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis me tog gi phreng @261b ba bzung la /
T02D1444:261b-1: zhal bzhi'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dar ser po'am dmar pos gdong g-yogs bya ba ste /
T02D1444:261b-2: slob ma tha ma 'bring ni mi mthong bar //
T02D1444:261b-3: mchog ni cung zad mthong bar bcing bar bya //
T02D1444:261b-4: de nas las thams cad pa'i chus bsangs te dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i phyir//
T02D1444:261b-5: kye dga' ba sdug gu khyod su yin //
T02D1444:261b-7: des kyang kye bde ba chen po kho bo ni
T02D1444:261b-8: skal ba bzang po lags so zhes brjod par bya'o
T02D1444:261b-11: sangs rgyas mchog gi dam tshig bgyi 'tshal //
T02D1444:261b-13: de nas de'i mgo bor lag pa bzhag la /
T02D1444:261b-14: aom sarbba yo ga tsitta auta p'a da y'a mi /
T02D1444:261b-15: zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis byang chub kyi sems bskyed la /
T02D1444:261b-16: me tog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje snying gar bzhag ste /
T02D1444:261b-17: aom su ra te sa ma ya stvam /
T02D1444:261b-18: ho siddha badzra ya th'a su kham zhes bya ba 'dis so //
T02D1444:261b-19: de nas 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
T02D1444:261b-20: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur gyis /
T02D1444:261b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di //
T02D1444:261b-22: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la
T02D1444:261b-23: smra bar ma byed cig / ma dad par yang
T02D1444:261b-24: mi bya'o // de nas shar phyogs kyi sgo skyong ma'i sngags kyis slob ma bkug ste /
T02D1444:261b-25: sngar bstan pa'i yi ge lngas yol ba'i nang du bcug la /
T02D1444:261b-26: shar phyogs su bzhag ste lag pa nas bzung la 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
T02D1444:261b-27: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis /
T02D1444:261b-28: de bas na ngas khyod la rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya yis //
T02D1444:261b-29: ye shes gang gis khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na /
T02D1444:261b-30: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos //
T02D1444:261b-31: khyod kyis 'di dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du brjod par mi bya'o //
T02D1444:261b-32: khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes so //
T02D1444:261b-33: de nas mgo bor rdo rje bzhag la 'di skang brjod do //
T02D1444:261b-34: 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje ste /
T02D1444:261b-35: gal te 'di 'ga' la smra na 'dis khyod kyi mgo 'gas par byed do //
T02D1444:261b-36: de nas snying gar rdo rje bzhag nas 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02D1444:261b-37: aom shr'i he ru ka deng khyod kyi //
T02D1444:261b-38: snying la de ring yang dag zhugs //
T02D1444:261b-39: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D1444:262a-2: zhes bya ba 'dis mna' bsgags nas /
T02D1444:262a-3: padma'i snod na gnas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga dang /
T02D1444:262a-4: tsandan dang gur gum la sogs pa bsres ba'i chus yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1444:262a-5: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D1444:262a-6: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02D1444:262a-7: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub 'grub //
T02D1444:262a-8: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thung shig / aom badzra
T02D1444:262a-9: panytsa aa mri tod ka tha tha h'um zhes brjod
T02D1444:262a-11: de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D1444:262a-12: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi dpal he ru ka nga yin gyi /
T02D1444:262a-13: ngas gang 'di gyis zhes smras pa de bu khyod kyis bya dgos so //
T02D1444:262a-14: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /
T02D1444:262a-15: brnyas pa byas na khyod ya nga ba ma spangs
T02D1444:262a-16: par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba
T02D1444:262a-17: chen por ltung bar gyur ta re zhes so //
T02D1444:262a-18: de dag ni dam tshig gi chu sbyin pa'o //
T02D1444:262a-19: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
T02D1444:262a-20: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab tu gsol zhes brjod du bcug la /
T02D1444:262a-21: de'i mgo bor yi ge bam las byung ba'i chu'i
T02D1444:262a-22: dkyil 'khor zlum po bum pas mtshan pa de la
T02D1444:262a-23: ha / snying gar lam las byung ba'i dbang chen
T02D1444:262a-24: gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ser po rdo rje
T02D1444:262a-25: rtse gsum pas grva rnams su mtshan pa de la
T02D1444:262a-26: ha / h'um / lte bar ram las grub pa'i
T02D1444:262a-27: me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa dmar po rno zhing
T02D1444:262a-29: rkang pa'i 'og tu yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor
T02D1444:262a-30: sngon po g-yo ba gzhur snang ba ba dan gyis
T02D1444:262a-31: zur mtshan pa de la dzhee: drag cing bzod par
T02D1444:262a-32: dka' ba 'bar ba'i lus kyi rlung gis ji srid
T02D1444:262a-33: du me'i dkyil 'khor dang phrad pa'i bar du 'bud
T02D1444:262a-34: bzhin par bsams la der yang des sbar te shin
T02D1444:262a-35: tu tsha ba cher 'bar bas dbang chen gyi dkyil
T02D1444:262a-37: de nas chu'i dkyil 'khor la bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'i tshogs kyis ngoms shing tshim bzhin pa /
T02D1444:262a-38: rlung gis kyang slob ma bteg bzhin pa la /
T02D1444:262a-39: bdag nyid kyang dregs pa dang bcas pa'i khro bo
T02D1444:262a-40: chen po rdo rje khrag 'thung drag po'i lus g-yas
T02D1444:262a-41: pas rdo rje gsor zhing g-yon pas dril bu dkrol
T02D1444:262a-42: bas / 'bebs pa'i sngags kyis bdug spos byin dbab par bya'o //
T02D1444:262a-43: de la sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D1444:262b-0: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam @262b hum
T02D1444:262b-1: h'um phat d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam ba ra
T02D1444:262b-2: sv'a h'a / a'a be sh'a ya stambha ya ra
T02D1444:262b-3: ra ra ra ts'a la ya h'um ha aa dzhee:
T02D1444:262b-4: sv'a h'a / h'um phat / zhes bya ba ste 'dis myur du phebs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1444:262b-5: slob ma la babs par rig nas de padma'i rigs
T02D1444:262b-6: kyi lha mo'i gzugs su yud tsam gyis dmigs la
T02D1444:262b-7: / tishtha badzra zhes bya ba 'dis babs pa brtan par bya ste /
T02D1444:262b-8: de'i lce la yi ge aa dmar po bsams nas
T02D1444:262b-9: bru hi badzra zhes brjod na dge ba dang mi
T02D1444:262b-10: dge ba smra bar byed do //
T02D1444:262b-11: aom mgon po chen po rdo rje chos //
T02D1444:262b-12: 'od dpag med pa bde ba che //
T02D1444:262b-13: 'dod chags chen po chos gsungs shing //
T02D1444:262b-14: dge dang mi dge gang yin dri //
T02D1444:262b-15: zhes bya ba 'dis dri bar bya'o //
T02D1444:262b-16: babs pa de yang gang la babs pa las dge mi dge smra bar bya'o //
T02D1444:262b-17: sems la babs pa las 'jig rten gsum na gnas pa shes so //
T02D1444:262b-18: lus la babs na nam mkhar 'phags so //
T02D1444:262b-19: gal te ring du 'phags na de'i tshe de'i mgo'i
T02D1444:262b-20: steng du lam las byung ba'i dbang chen gyi dkyil
T02D1444:262b-21: 'khor sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan par bsgoms na mi
T02D1444:262b-24: de nas yang lho phyogs kyi sgor mngon par langs la /
T02D1444:262b-27: na mo na ma: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1444:262b-28: zhes bya bas lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas lan gsum phyag bya ba sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D1444:262b-29: aom sarbba b'i ra yo gi n+ye p'u dza au
T02D1444:262b-30: pashtha n'a ya a'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi
T02D1444:262b-31: / sarba ta th'a ga ta b'i ra yo gi
T02D1444:262b-32: n'i a'atma aa mu kam aa dhi tishtha sva m'am
T02D1444:262b-33: / / zhes bya bas lus thams cad kyis phyag byed du gzhug go //
T02D1444:262b-34: de nas g-yon phyogs su thal mo de nyid snying gar sbyor du bcug la /
T02D1444:262b-36: aom sarbba b'i ra yo gi n+ya p'u dza aa bhi she k'a ya ;
T02D1444:262b-37: a'atma n'am n'irya ta y'a mi sarbba ta th'a ga
T02D1444:262b-38: ta b'i ra yo gi ni a'atma aa mu kam
T02D1444:262b-40: de nas byang phyogs kyi sgor thal mo de nyid dpral bar bzhag la phyag byed du gzhug go //
T02D1444:262b-41: aom sarbba b'i ra yo gi ni n+ye p'u dza
T02D1444:262b-42: pra brta n'a ya a'atma n'am n'i rya ta y'a
T02D1444:262b-43: mi sarbba ta th'a ga ta b'i ra yo gi
T02D1444:262b-44: n'i a'atma aa mu kam pra bart'a ya m'am ;
T02D1444:262b-45: de nas nub phyogs kyi sgor thal mo sbyor ba
T02D1444:262b-46: de nyid mgor bzhag la phyag byed du gzhug ste
T02D1444:262b-47: / aom sarbba b'i ra yo ge n+ye p'u dza karma ni a'atma n'am /
T02D1444:262b-48: n'i rya ta y'a mi sarbba ta th'a ga ta
T02D1444:262b-49: b'i ra yo gi ni a'atma aa mu kam a'adya
T02D1444:262b-53: aom de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas//
T02D1444:263a-0: @263a * // lha mo rnams kyi chos 'byung nyid //
T02D1444:263a-1: rin chen sna tshogs khang brtsigs ma //
T02D1444:263a-2: he ru ka dpal po brang mchog / snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du //
T02D1444:263a-3: bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi //
T02D1444:263a-4: lha yi rigs kyi rim pa dag / bsod nams ji bzhin de bzhin shog /
T02D1444:263a-6: rigs ni gang gi snod du 'gyur //
T02D1444:263a-7: 'di yis bsod nams ci yod las //
T02D1444:263a-8: dkyil 'khor 'dir ni de bzhin shog / ces bya bas bden pa'i byin rlabs byas la /
T02D1444:263a-9: mig lam du snang ba'i 'od kyi bye brag dri'o //
T02D1444:263a-10: des kyang smra bar bya ste /
T02D1444:263a-11: de la dkar po dang ser po dang /
T02D1444:263a-12: dmar po dang sngon po'i dbye bas zhi ba dang /
T02D1444:263a-13: rgyas pa dang dbang dang drag shul spyod pa rnams
T02D1444:263a-14: kyi dngos grub kyi snod du go rims bzhin bstan
T02D1444:263a-15: la / de nas sngar yi ge lngas bzung ba'i
T02D1444:263a-16: me tog gi breng ba tr'am gis byin gyis brlabs
T02D1444:263a-17: pa h'um gis dkyil 'khor du dor bar bya ste
T02D1444:263a-18: la / / pra t'i tstsha badzra ho zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D1444:263a-19: de la gal te sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzod spu'am
T02D1444:263a-20: gtsug tor ram dbul lhung na phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D1444:263a-21: dngos grub bo // spyan nam zhal la lhung na sngags kyi dngos grub po //
T02D1444:263a-22: sku'i stod du lhung na dngos grub rab po //
T02D1444:263a-23: bar la ni dngos grub 'bring ngo //
T02D1444:263a-24: smad kyi cha la ni dngos grub tha ma'o //
T02D1444:263a-25: gzugs brnyan dang shin tu ring na ni shin tu ring la /
T02D1444:263a-26: nye na ni dngos grub myur ro //
T02D1444:263a-27: lha rnams kyi rang gi gnas ni re'u mig la sogs pa bcad pa las shes par bya'o //
T02D1444:263a-28: gal te lha gnyis kyi bar du lhung na /
T02D1444:263a-29: me tog gang la nye ba de'i rigs kyi lha yin no //
T02D1444:263a-30: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du lhung na dngos grub med do //
T02D1444:263a-31: gal te dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du lhung na slar yang dor bar bya ste /
T02D1444:263a-32: lan gsum byas nas gal te de nyid du lhung na /
T02D1444:263a-33: de'i tshe gzung bar mi bya'o //
T02D1444:263a-34: de dag ni me tog dor ba'o //
T02D1444:263a-35: de'i rjes la slob ma'i mig gnyis la yi ge aom gnyis bsams la ;
T02D1444:263a-36: he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyi //
T02D1444:263a-37: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad //
T02D1444:263a-38: mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad de //
T02D1444:263a-39: rdo rje mig ni bla na med //
T02D1444:263a-40: aom dzny'a na tsakshu badzra h'um sv'a h'a zhes brjod cing gdong g-yogs bsal nas /
T02D1444:263a-41: aom dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos //
T02D1444:263a-42: da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed//
T02D1444:263b-0: @263b khyod ni rnal 'byor ma sras skye //
T02D1444:263b-1: sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs //
T02D1444:263b-2: 'gro ba'i phun sum tshogs kun dang //
T02D1444:263b-3: dngos grub phun tshogs khyod mngon gyur //
T02D1444:263b-4: dam tshig thams cad bskyang ba dang //
T02D1444:263b-5: gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis //
T02D1444:263b-6: zhes brjod nas 'phangs pa'i ma tog gi phreng ba de blangs la /
T02D1444:263b-7: de'i spyi bor pra ti grihna sba mi mam satva
T02D1444:263b-8: ma h'a b'a la zhes brjod cing bcing bar bya'o
T02D1444:263b-9: // de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha so so'i ming
T02D1444:263b-10: bstan pa mngon du 'gro bas shar phyogs kyi sgo
T02D1444:263b-12: bdag po'i mthar thug par bstan par bya'o //
T02D1444:263b-13: de dag ni slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1444:263b-14: de nas dbang bskur ba'i don du bla ma la 'byor pa ji lta bas yon phul te /
T02D1444:263b-15: yan lag lngas phyag byas nas pus mo'i lha nga
T02D1444:263b-16: sa la btsugs nas thal mo khong stong du sbyar
T02D1444:263b-17: nas / ji ltar sangs rgyas mkhas rnams kyis //
T02D1444:263b-18: rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur ltar //
T02D1444:263b-19: bdag kyang mgon pos dbang bskur zhing //
T02D1444:263b-20: mchog kyang bdag la stsal du gsol //
T02D1444:263b-21: zhes brjod cing slob mas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1444:263b-22: de nas slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba'i don du
T02D1444:263b-23: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor las phyi rol du khru do
T02D1444:263b-24: yongs su dor ba'i lho phyogs kyi sgo la mngon
T02D1444:263b-25: par phyogs par snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi
T02D1444:263b-26: tshad gru bzhi pa brtsegs ma'i dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi
T02D1444:263b-27: pa dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar
T02D1444:263b-28: dang bcas pa snam bu la shar du 'khor lo
T02D1444:263b-31: byang du ral gri bris par de'i dbus su slob ma bzhag la /
T02D1444:263b-32: h'um bzlas pa'i yungs kar g-yas pa dang /
T02D1444:263b-33: g-yon pa'i chad pa nas bzung ste /
T02D1444:263b-34: re re zhing lan gnyis su g-yas skor dang g-yon
T02D1444:263b-35: skor du bskor zhing lag pa gnyis slob ma la
T02D1444:263b-37: de nas dkyil 'khor dbang phyug gi sngags kyi dris
T02D1444:263b-38: byug cing mar dang bcas pa'i sa rdza ra sa'i
T02D1444:263b-39: spos h'um bzlas pas bdug par bya'o //
T02D1444:263b-40: de dag ni mi gtsang ba bsal ba'i cho ga'o //

T02D1444:270a-9: zhes bya ba 'dis me tog gis rtsi gzhug go //
T02D1444:270a-10: des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i
T02D1444:270a-11: rnam pa'i bdag nyid du rig pas aa ho su
T02D1444:270a-13: kha yis drangs la rang gi longs spyod kyi sbubs su gzhug go //
T02D1444:270a-14: de bzhin nyid kyang langs nas rang gi chu skyes kyi nang gi lhag ma sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa /
T02D1444:270a-15: deng nas brtsams te bu khyod kyis //
T02D1444:270a-16: brtul zhugs bzang pos 'gro don gyis //
T02D1444:270a-17: bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang //
T02D1444:270a-18: dmangs rigs mthar skyes bu mo rnams //
T02D1444:270a-20: bdud rtsi rnams ni bsgrub par gyis //
T02D1444:270a-22: kha'i padma'i nam mkhar gos pa med par gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1444:270a-23: de dag ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1444:270a-24: de ma thag tu de bzhin nyid gcig par 'dod pa 'am /
T02D1444:270a-25: de bzhin nyid tha dad par 'dod pa des mgon pos yang dag par rig par byas nas /
T02D1444:270a-26: de bzhin nyid gcig tu 'dod pas ni de bzhin nyid de de nyid la'o //
T02D1444:270a-27: tha dad pa la yang gzhan te dam tshig dang sdom pa la gnas pa /
T02D1444:270a-28: si hla dang ga pur dang yang dag par ldan pa /
T02D1444:270a-29: lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ma dang /
T02D1444:270a-30: rang rig pa tsam gyi ye shes mngon du bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1444:270a-31: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02D1444:270a-32: mchod chen ji ltar stsal ba ltar //
T02D1444:270a-33: bdag la'ang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir //
T02D1444:270a-34: nam mkha' rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
T02D1444:270a-35: zhes bya bas gsol ba btab pa'i slob ma la //
T02D1444:270a-36: de'i lag pa de'i lag par gtad nas /
T02D1444:270a-37: sangs rgyas thams cad dpang por byas te spyi bor
T02D1444:270a-38: rdo rje bzhag ste snying ga'i sa bon las spros
T02D1444:270a-39: pa'i mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams
T02D1444:270a-40: kyis ji skad du gsung pa'i bya ba sngon du
T02D1444:270a-41: 'gro bas / khyod kyi gzungs ma nyams dga' 'di //
T02D1444:270b-0: bsten byar sangs rgyas rnams kyis @270b brtags //
T02D1444:270b-1: rdo rje padma rab sbyor bas //
T02D1444:270b-2: bde ba dam pa yang dag myong //
T02D1444:270b-3: thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs mi rgya //
T02D1444:270b-5: de bas 'di dang bral bar ni //
T02D1444:270b-6: khyod ni nam yang ma byed cig /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1444:270b-7: rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med /
T02D1444:270b-8: rmongs pa gang zhig 'da' byed na //
T02D1444:270b-9: mchog gi dngos grub de la med //
T02D1444:270b-10: ces brjod la gtad par bya'o //
T02D1444:270b-11: de yang tsandan dang gur kum la sogs pa rnam par byugs shing /
T02D1444:270b-12: shin tu dri zhim pa'i me tog gi phreng bas nye bar brgyan pas /
T02D1444:270b-13: gos med par chu skyes kha phye bar mngon par gsal bar ston cing 'di skad smra bar bya'o //
T02D1444:270b-14: bshang gci la sogs za ba dang //
T02D1444:270b-15: khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha //
T02D1444:270b-16: rtag par bud med mchog gus pas //
T02D1444:270b-18: bu khyod spro bar byed dam ci //
T02D1444:270b-19: bu yis ji ltar bde bar smros //
T02D1444:270b-22: bshad gci la sogs za ba dang //
T02D1444:270b-23: bud med rtag tu gus par bgyi //
T02D1444:270b-24: bha ga nyid la 'o bgyid par //
T02D1444:270b-25: lha mo ci phyir bdag mi spro //
T02D1444:270b-27: des kyang dga' ba dang byams pa dang bcas pas de skal pa bzang po sdug par blta zhing /
T02D1444:270b-28: tsog tsog pus chu skyes rab tu bstan nas 'di skad smra bar bya'o //
T02D1444:270b-30: bde ba kun dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1444:270b-31: gang zhig cho gas bsten byed pa //
T02D1444:270b-32: de yi mdun na bdag ni gnas //
T02D1444:270b-33: rdzogs sangs mnyes par bya la sogs //
T02D1444:270b-34: bya ba ci yin padmar gyis //
T02D1444:270b-35: bde chen rgyal po rang nyid ni //
T02D1444:270b-36: 'di nyid na ni rtag tu bzhugs //
T02D1444:270b-37: bhanydza mo ksha ho zhes pa'o //
T02D1444:270b-38: des kyang rang nyid lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas shes rab lha mo'i gzugs su bskyed la /
T02D1444:270b-39: yi ge h'um las rang gi gsang ba'i rdo rje dkar po //
T02D1444:270b-40: by'a las nor bu dmar po by'a ser pos bu ga bkag pa /
T02D1444:270b-41: yi ge aa las phyag rgya'i padma dmar po 'dab ma gsum pa /
T02D1444:270b-42: dy'a las ze'u 'bru dkar po dy'a ser pos bu ga bkag par bsams la /
T02D1444:270b-43: g-yon gyi chu skyes kyi g-yon dos na gnas pa'i rtsa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma /
T02D1444:270b-45: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1444:271a-1: sngags zlos pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D1444:271a-2: bla ma'i man ngag las dga' ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba rtogs shing /
T02D1444:271a-3: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi
T02D1444:271a-4: tshogs rnams kyis bkug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D1444:271a-5: kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus can /
T02D1444:271a-6: bla mas kyang de'i sems la spyan ma la sogs
T02D1444:271a-7: pa'i lha mo rnams bcug pa dang ldan pas dga'
T02D1444:271a-9: de nas bla mas yol ba'i phag tu a'a li
T02D1444:271a-10: k'a li'i sgo nas slob ma'i rigs brtags la rigs
T02D1444:271a-11: nges pa'i phyag rgya rgyud nas gsungs pa bstan par
T02D1444:271a-13: rdo rje padmar rab bzhag nas /
T02D1444:271a-14: byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya //
T02D1444:271a-15: bskyod par byas nas dga' ba de //
T02D1444:271a-16: sems bkang nas ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1444:271a-17: rnal 'byor pa yi byang chub sems //
T02D1444:271a-18: ji srid gtong bar mi byed pa //
T02D1444:271a-19: de srid kun dga' las byung ba'i //
T02D1444:271a-20: dga' skyes bde ba ci yang 'thob //
T02D1444:271a-21: dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur pa'i //
T02D1444:271a-22: byang chub sems ni ltung gyur na //
T02D1444:271a-23: phung po rnam shes brgyal ba la //
T02D1444:271a-24: ma smad dngos grub ga la yod //
T02D1444:271a-25: mkha' dbyings rdo rje legs sbyor dang //
T02D1444:271a-26: reg las ngo mtshar chen po yi //
T02D1444:271a-27: bde ba 'byung ba gang yin de'i /
T02D1444:271a-28: mchog tu dga' ba byed pa'o //
T02D1444:271a-29: mchog dga' dga' bral dbus dag tu //
T02D1444:271a-30: mtshon cha brtags te brtan par gyis //
T02D1444:271a-31: pad mkhar rdo rje'i lte ba yis //
T02D1444:271a-32: gnon gnas rdo rje'i skyil krung las //
T02D1444:271a-33: nor bu'i nang chung sems blta zhing //
T02D1444:271a-34: ye shes skyes gang de'i ngo bo mchog /'dod chags ma yin chags bral min //
T02D1444:271a-35: dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med //
T02D1444:271a-36: gsum po spangs pa nyid las ni //
T02D1444:271a-37: lhan skyes yang dag byang chub brjod //
T02D1444:271a-38: gang tshe rnal 'byor ba shes blta //
T02D1444:271a-39: mi 'gyur ba yi bde bar gnas //
T02D1444:271a-40: thun nam yang na nyin gcig gam //
T02D1444:271a-41: zla phyed zla gcig khyud kor lo //
T02D1444:271a-42: bskal ba bskal pa stong dag tu //
T02D1444:271a-43: ye shes mngon par brtson par gnas //
T02D1444:271a-44: de ltar brtags la nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du legs par bzung la bags kyis phyung la /
T02D1444:271a-45: chu skyes nas ma bton par byang chub kyi sems
T02D1444:271a-46: dam tshig gi ngo bo de lce nyid kyi de
T02D1444:271a-47: kho na mthong bas blang bar bya'o //
T02D1444:271b-0: slob mas rtogs nas @271b legs bzung ste //
T02D1444:271b-1: padma'i nang du phyung nas ni //
T02D1444:271b-2: de nas sems ni lce yis su //
T02D1444:271b-3: blang bya byang chub sngon 'gro bas //
T02D1444:271b-5: de dag ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1444:271b-6: de'i rjes la sbyin par bya ba dbang bskur ba
T02D1444:271b-7: bzhi po bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya ba
T02D1444:271b-9: de nyid 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don phun sum tshogs par byed pa /
T02D1444:271b-10: rtog pa'i rnyog pa dang bral ba nyid kyis bla
T02D1444:271b-11: na med pa yang dag par rig pa dang tha
T02D1444:271b-12: mi dad pa / thub pa'i tshogs dpag tu med
T02D1444:271b-13: pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i
T02D1444:271b-14: bdag nyid yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu bstan
T02D1444:271b-15: pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshig gis sbyin par bya'o
T02D1444:271b-16: zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa ste /
T02D1444:271b-17: de yang ji skad du gsungs pa'i cho gas dbang bskur byin nas ni /
T02D1444:271b-18: slob ma'i lhag par mos par sems kyis legs brtags nas //
T02D1444:271b-19: rgya che zab pa'i tshul la shin tu mos pa na //
T02D1444:271b-20: tshig nyid kyis ni dbang bskur rin chen skyin par bya //
T02D1444:271b-22: rgya che ba la mos sam mi mos pa 'di ji ltar rtogs par bya zhe na /
T02D1444:271b-23: mtshan ma'i khyad par las te /
T02D1444:271b-25: du ba las ni mer shes shing //
T02D1444:271b-26: chu skyar las ni chur shes bya //
T02D1444:271b-27: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis //
T02D1444:271b-28: rigs ni mtshan ma dag las shes //
T02D1444:271b-29: bzhin gyi padma rab dang zhing //
T02D1444:271b-30: dga' bas ba spu langs pa ni //
T02D1444:271b-31: mthong nas mkhas pa de nyid kyis //
T02D1444:271b-32: slob ma dam pa rjes su 'dzin //
T02D1444:271b-34: zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa'i dbang bskur ba ste /
T02D1444:271b-35: 'di ni yang sbyin pa zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D1444:271b-36: de nas sbyin sreg gis zhi bar bya ste //
T02D1444:271b-37: dgang blugs gcig gam gsum mam bdun phul la yon brjod du gzhug go //
T02D1444:271b-38: de dag gis kyang mgu ba'i yid kyis 'byor pa ji lta ba bzhin du sa gzhi'am /
T02D1444:271b-45: bdag nyid grogs nyid du dngos grub grub pas dge
T02D1444:271b-46: ba la sogs pa yon tan nye bar bsags pa'i
T02D1444:271b-47: phyir dbul lo // sangs rgyas zhing sogs dag bya'i phyir //
T02D1444:271b-48: khyad par du ni sbyin la spyod //
T02D1444:271b-49: dmangs rigs stong phrag gnyis dag ni //
T02D1444:272a-2: bram ze stong phrag gnyis dag kyang //
T02D1444:272a-3: dge slong gcig dang rab tu sbyar //
T02D1444:272a-4: dge slong stong phrag gnyis dang ni //
T02D1444:272a-5: rdul med pa ni gcig dang mnyam //
T02D1444:272a-6: rdul med stong phrag gnyis dag ni //
T02D1444:272a-7: ye shes ldan pa gcig dang sbyar //
T02D1444:272a-8: ye shes ldan pa stong phrag gnyis //
T02D1444:272a-9: slob dpon gcig dang mnyam pas mchod //
T02D1444:272a-10: de ltar sbyin pa'i zhing shes nas //
T02D1444:272a-11: blo dang ldan pas rtag tu sbyin //
T02D1444:272a-12: rnal 'byor rtsa ba'i chos la ni //
T02D1444:272a-13: zhing bzang po las sa bon gdab //
T02D1444:272a-14: de nas yon phul ba de blangs la /
T02D1444:272a-15: zas dang gnas la sogs pa thams cad kyis rang
T02D1444:272a-16: dang gzhan dag tshogs kyi 'khor los mchod par bya
T02D1444:272a-17: ste / skal pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnams gzung la /
T02D1444:272a-18: tshogs mchog sna tshogs pas tshim par byas la /
T02D1444:272a-19: srid pa gsum 'bar sku ni rjes chags 'dul bar ldan //
T02D1444:272a-20: 'od zer rnon po stong ldan nyi ma brgya stong ldan //
T02D1444:272a-21: rnam mang sku dang cha lugs rjes chags sems dpar ldan //
T02D1444:272a-22: he ru ka dpal sngags pa lhan cig gar byed do //
T02D1444:272a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i glu blang ngo //
T02D1444:272a-25: de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa la sogs pa byas la gsol ba gdab ste /
T02D1444:272a-26: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D1444:272a-27: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D1444:272a-28: slar yang byon par mdzad slad du //
T02D1444:272a-29: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol //
T02D1444:272a-30: aom a'a: h'um badzra mu: zhes brjod de ye shes
T02D1444:272a-31: kyi 'khor lo gshegs su gsol nas dam tshig gi
T02D1444:272a-33: lha'i nga rgyal brtan pas chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa'o //
T02D1444:272a-34: chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'o zhes brjod
T02D1444:272a-35: cing rdo rje'i rtse mos shar phyogs kyi sgo nas
T02D1444:272a-36: brtsams te 'khor lo dbyi bar bya'o //
T02D1444:272a-37: de nas don du gnyer ba dag la rdul tshon cung zad byin la //
T02D1444:272a-38: chu bo chen por thams cad dor bar bya'o //
T02D1444:272a-39: mtshams med pa dang sdig ngan yang //
T02D1444:272a-40: chon rtsi mthong bas grol bar 'gyur //
T02D1444:272a-41: 'dir dbang bskur ba tsam gyis ni //
T02D1444:272a-42: gtsang ma'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1444:272a-43: khung bu dgang dang rab gnas dang //
T02D1444:272a-44: sbyin sreg 'khor lo'i nor gang yin //
T02D1444:272b-0: de kun @272b slob dpon nyid yin zhes //
T02D1444:272b-1: rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog gis gsungs //
T02D1444:272b-2: bde mchog dkyil 'khor cho ga ni //
T02D1444:272b-3: mkhas rnams mngon par 'dod pa bzhin //

T02D1444:272b-5: bsod nams rgya chen gang thob pa //
T02D1444:272b-6: de yis bdag dang 'gro ba kun //
T02D1444:272b-7: rdo rje 'chang chen nyid gyur cig bcom ldan 'das
T02D1444:272b-8: dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho
T02D1444:272b-9: ga rin po che rab tu gsal ba'i sgron ma
T02D1444:272b-10: zhes bya ba / slob dpon dpal la ba pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1444:272b-12: // / rgya gar gyi mkhas pa chen po su ma ti k'i rti dang /
T02D1444:272b-13: pod kyi lo ts'a ba mkhas pa chen po mar
